description:
Ooh. Ooh! Are you ready for this?

:bird::bird::bird::bird::bird::bird::bird::bird::bird:
It's **NATIONAL BIRD DAY**.
:bird::bird::bird::bird::bird::bird::bird::bird::bird:

Yeah. **BIRBS REPRESENT!** Big ones, small ones, long ones, short ones, skinny ones, and _perfectly spherical_ ones. We are loud and proud! Well, we are at least proud. Only some of us are loud. :bird::dash::mega::hear_no_evil: 

I shall be accepting tribute on this most hallowed of days, to be donated to **Birbs Without Borders** and **Feed the Birbs**. `TheBirbIsTheWord` on Paymo or `$BirbyBirbBirb` on Stash App! Help the birbs! :pray::moneybag:
